content: Use the DIY Bench [#0] times
{A得意}I sneaked a peek at Dr. Mors' paper... Islets have <style=Highlight>rare insects</style> that don't exist on our Planet. Let's go and make friends with them, mm!
Spend [#0] Dough at Islet vending machines while traveling with Dorjelang

<style=Highlight>Spending Dough</style> to get materials from the <style=Highlight>vending machines</style> on Islets is... {A心虚目移}probably much easier than gathering them myself. Would you like to come with me next time, moo?
{A拍手}Big ores and fulfilled wishes—I knew you had it in you! Thanks, friend.
{A疑惑}The <style=Highlight>Cozy Dream Dinosaur Onesie</style>... Did I see it in the shop? Or maybe on TV? Hmm...
{A思考}Have you noticed those <style=Highlight>dahlias</style>? {A笑眯眯}You can dig them up with a shovel and transplant them to your Planet. Who knows? Something mysterious might happen, yeep?
{A点头}If I may, please let me come along when you travel. I want to bring [#0] <style=Highlight>orange butterflies</style> back for my observations...

{A沉醉闻}<style=SizeSmall>Slurp-slurp-slurp—that's the taste!</style> The temperature and humidity lately's perfect for growin' tomatoes! Hey <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, wanna plant some <style=Highlight>tomatoes</style> together?

<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, tashi delek! Would you be interested in traveling with me to different <style=Highlight>Islets</style>? {A豆豆眼}Mmmooo? I'm planning on searching for new hat-making materials.
{A笑眯眯}So relaxing, baa-daa~ My recent wishes came true~! I'm getting closer now to that floofalicious life...
Catch [#0] beetles
Obtain clothing that has blue or white
{A得意}Wanna come on an adventure to find Daikabutomaru? Even if we don't spot one, we'll surely, definitely, come across some <style=Highlight>suuuper rare insects</style>, mm!
{A想到了}Mmmooo? Buddy! Thank you so much for caring about my wishes and making them come true. If you ever need a hand, please let me help too, no mooo holding back.

Yeep~ You're so light on your feet! {A思考}Speaking of, have you ever tried catching a <style=Highlight>sixbar swordtail</style>? Maybe we could try catching one together the next time we're out and about?
{A小坏笑}Time to swing my palm—I mean, swing that mattock around! They hide among all the ores, the humble yet useful <style=Highlight>quartz</style>!
{A惊讶}Would you like to trade for a <style=Highlight>plushie</style>? I'll take your spare DIY Cards. I love collecting them for inspiration~!
{A不好意思}If I may, please allow me to join you on your travels. I want to bring [#0] <style=Highlight>sixbar swordtails</style> back for my observations...
Water crops [#0] times
{A抱歉}I know this is asking a lot, mmmooo... but I really want to study how you wear your hat. <style=Highlight>Any hat</style> you put on will guide my next design.
{A小坏笑}Yep, those <style=Highlight>Goldflux Ores</style> on the ground that shine right in your eyes when you hit 'em with a mattock. Let's give it a shot, bhan?
{A笑眯眯}I made some more cute little things! If you have any spare DIY Cards, you can trade them with me for a <style=Highlight>plushie</style>!
{A笑眯眯}Thank you for making my wishes come true, my friend! You've brought me more surprises than a shooting star in the sky, yeep~!

{A思考}I saw a hat recently that would suit you perfectly. It's woven from rattan and decorated with white flowers. It's called the <style=Highlight>New Rain Sun Hat</style>. I don't remoomber where I saw it. Maybe on Loomi Mart?
Craft [#0] pieces of furniture using stone materials at the DIY Bench
Collect [#0] Goldflux Ore while traveling with Bhadra
{A不好意思}I love decorating my home with handmade items. Sometimes, just being near the <style=Highlight>DIY Bench</style> makes me feel full of inspiration.
{A想象中}Destination: Islet. Target: A <style=Highlight>beetle</style> named Daikabutomaru. As long as it's a beetle, it can be named Daikabutomaru, mm.
{A得意}You'll find <style=Highlight>suuuper rare insects</style>, on the Islets. And this time, I want to travel with friends. This is the Isaki way of traveling, mm!
Own a New Rain Sun Hat
Visit [#0] Islets while traveling with Dorjelang
{A看我的}When you've caught a <style=Highlight>beetle</style>, shout "Got you, Daikabutomaru!" like they do in the anime will fill you with poooower! You have to try it, mm.
Different cropses and grainses need different seasons, weather, temperature, and humidity. {A沉醉闻}Now is the perfect time to plant some... that's right mah~ Some <style=Highlight>rice</style>!
Wear a hat

{A歪头}Are you planning to go out anytime soon? I was reading a field guide the other day, and it said that if you look at too many <style=Highlight>orange butterflies</style>,{短暂停} you'll get hungry! I'm very curious about this...
{沉醉闻}I've found, traces of a <style=Highlight>Daikabutomaru</style> never seen before! Want to come with me? A chance encounter with—the amaaazing Daikabutomaru, mm!
Hm~? My wish upon a star... it came true! {A害羞冒烟}Thank you for always looking after me. <style=SizeSmall>So is this what it feels like to be a carefully tended crop mah...?</style>
Harvest rice [#0] times
{A惊叹}Whaa? There's ripe <style=Highlight>wheat</style> growing on the Islets? Let's go harvest some together, okay mah~? We can't let all that hard work of growing go to waste!
{A歪头}Wanna go on a trip together? I can almost hear the <style=Highlight>ore-rich Islets</style> calling out to us...
Obtain [#0] pieces of quartz by breaking rocks
Wanna go on another trip? {A得意}I've got a feeling we're gonna find a toooon of great stuff! We'll strike those <style=Highlight>big rocks</style> right—in—the—veins!
{A点头}Yep, the <style=Highlight>big, big, rocks</style> on the ground that make a crisp "ding" when you hit 'em with a mattock. Wanna give it a shot, bhan?
{A歪头}Meh? The colors of the sky... As long as it's <style=Highlight>blue</style> or <style=Highlight>white</style>, I think anyone who wears it will turn into a cloud~!
{A思考}Have you noticed those <style=Highlight>purple flowers</style>? You can dig them up with a shovel and transplant them to your Planet. Who knows? Something mysterious might happen, yeep?
Catch [#0] orange butterflies while traveling with Frostia
{A不好意思}Once you plant the seeds of cropses and grainses, you gotta <style=Highlight>water</style> them to help 'em grow! Don't forget loh~
Obtain [#0] pieces of fabric furniture
{A笑眯眯}Furniture made with soft <style=Highlight>fabric</style> feels so cozy. I just wanna flop on it... and do nothing at all. You wanna try too?
{me} has a Cozy Dream Dinosaur Onesie
The more I gaze at the sky, the more I want to weave it into my life. What if I put on <style=Highlight>sky-colored clothes</style> and baa-come a cloud?
Document [#0] insects in the Omnipedia

{A开心}When it comes to unidentified insects, whether it's a Daikabutomaru or not, Dr. Mors will examine it in a flash, and add it to the <style=Highlight>Omnipedia</style>. It's suuuper impressive, mm!
{A歪头}Islets are home to so many <style=Highlight>rare insects</style> that I've never seen before! I wanna visit one with you, very very much! Mm-hmm!

{A歪头}I'm curious, have you ever planted somethin' on your Planet? No matter what kinda cropses and grainses you got, just try <style=Highlight>planting them</style> mah~ You'll get some yummy harvests!

{A沉醉闻}<style=SizeSmall>Slurp-slurp-slurp—that's the taste!</style> The temperature and humidity lately's perfect for growin' rice! Hey <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, wanna plant some <style=Highlight>rice</style> together?
Harvest tomatoes [#0] times
<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, are you busy mah~? {A惊叹}People say they've spotted ripe <style=Highlight>wheat</style> during their travels. So, why not come harvest some with me mah~!
The <style=Highlight>Cozy Dream Dinosaur Onesie</style>, last time someone wore it... I thought it was a big plushie! Maybe I should use it as inspiration to make a little plushie?
Catch [#0] golden-quality insects while traveling with Isaki
Plant [#0] times on your Planet

<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, tashi delek! Lately, I've purchased HMM! Many materials by <style=Highlight>spending Dough</style> at the <style=Highlight>vending machines</style> on Islets. {A心虚目移}It's just so much easier than gathering materials myself. Would you like to come with, moo?
Purchase hats from Dorjelang [#0] times
Harvest [#0] stalks of wheat while traveling with Yunguo
Discover [#0] Ore Islets while traveling with Bhadra
{A笑眯眯}Wanna go on a trip together? Last night, I dreamt of some shining <style=Highlight>Goldflux Ores</style> calling out to us...
{A笑眯眯}Would you... like to try my <style=Highlight>fortune telling</style>? I-I may not be the best at it, but I'd love for you to give it a try! I hope it brings you good luck, yeep~
{A笑眯眯}Would you like to try my <style=Highlight>fortune telling</style>? If you come to me for [#0] readings... Maybe you'll discover the greatest secrets of the universe, yeep~?
Catch [#0] purple-quality insects while traveling with Isaki
{A歪头}You've got a <style=Highlight>DIY Bench</style>, right? And <style=Highlight>DIY Cards</style> that need <style=Highlight>stone materials</style>, right? Then let's get crackin', bhan!
Catch [#0] purple-quality beetles while traveling with Isaki
Exchange [#0] plushies with Medowlyn
{A想到了}Have you thought about <style=Highlight>buying hats</style> lately, moo? I've made some new ones. You're welcome to <style=Highlight>come see me</style> anytime.
Break [#0] rocks while traveling with Bhadra
{A歪头}Wanna head out together? I think I hear good stuff calling out to us—We might find lots of <style=Highlight>Ore Islets</style>!
Transplant [#0] purple flowers to your Planet
Catch [#0] sixbar swordtails while traveling with Frostia
{A想到了}My wishes, are complete! Next up, Isaki will complete his ultimate evolution—just like Daikabutomaru, mm!

<style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, tashi delek. {A想到了}Have you thought about <style=Highlight>buying hats</style> lately, moo? I've made some new ones. You're welcome to <style=Highlight>come see me</style> anytime.
Transplant [#0] dahlias to your Planet
Different cropses and grainses need different seasons, weather, temperature, and humidity. {A沉醉闻}Now is the perfect time to plant some... that's right mah~ Some <style=Highlight>tomatoes</style>!
{A想象中}I've been planning on a trip for new hat-making materials. Mmmooo... Would you be interested in exploring different <style=Highlight>Islets</style> with me?
